content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":258052,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカラーの森へ到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the Forest of Kara."},{"lineNumber":258053,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、ペンシルカウ","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at Pencil Cow."},{"lineNumber":258054,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍の侵攻でカラー達はあわてている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Kara and others are panicking due to the demon army's invasion."},{"lineNumber":258055,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t女王パステルは聖地死守を命じる","translatedEnglishLine":"Queen Pastel commands to defend the sacred ground to the death."},{"lineNumber":258056,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカラーの村は結界で隠されている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Kara village is hidden by a barrier."},{"lineNumber":258057,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍にそう簡単には見つからないが","translatedEnglishLine":"It won't be easily found by the demon army, however..."},{"lineNumber":258058,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t急いで行こう","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's hurry and go."},{"lineNumber":258059,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍の迎撃をしているイージスと出会う","translatedEnglishLine":"They encounter Aegis who is intercepting the demon army."},{"lineNumber":258060,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tイージス、シィルの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Aegis and Shiil."},{"lineNumber":258061,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、魔軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the demon army."},{"lineNumber":258062,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイ登場","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Red Eye appears."},{"lineNumber":258063,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカラー娘を惨殺","translatedEnglishLine":"Brutally massacres Kara girls."},{"lineNumber":258064,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tペンシルカウに到着する","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at Pencil Cow."},{"lineNumber":258065,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tパステルが頑固なので村に火を付けるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Since Pastel is stubborn, Rance sets fire to the village."},{"lineNumber":258066,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t村人みんなで脱出が決まった","translatedEnglishLine":"It was decided all villagers will escape together."},{"lineNumber":258067,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t聖地で神具を持ち出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Takes the divine relic from the sacred ground."},{"lineNumber":258068,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t英霊カラーも同行する","translatedEnglishLine":"The heroic spirit Kara also accompanies them."},{"lineNumber":258069,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２０００名のカラー達を連れて","translatedEnglishLine":"Bringing along 2000 Kara."},{"lineNumber":258070,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t脱出開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Escape begins."},{"lineNumber":258071,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t緊急時の脱出用洞窟を使う","translatedEnglishLine":"They use an emergency escape cave."},{"lineNumber":258072,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、魔軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the demon army."},{"lineNumber":258073,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tイアンとロナを交尾させようとしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Trying to make Ian and Rona mate."},{"lineNumber":258074,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイに新しい寄生ボディが用意された","translatedEnglishLine":"A new parasitic body is prepared for the demon Red Eye."},{"lineNumber":258075,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tランスとリセットの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Rance and Reset."},{"lineNumber":258076,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t魔軍にカラーの村が見つかった","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has found the Kara village."},{"lineNumber":258077,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t洞窟の中まで魔軍が追いかけてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has chased them inside the cave."},{"lineNumber":258078,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス達は最後尾に向かうが","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others head to the rear,"},{"lineNumber":258079,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t白色破壊光線をバリアで防ぐので精一杯","translatedEnglishLine":"They're barely holding back the white destructive beam with a barrier."},{"lineNumber":258080,"originalJapaneseLine":"白色破壊光線の合間をみて","translatedEnglishLine":"Taking advantage of the intervals between white destructive beams,"},{"lineNumber":258081,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍に向けて突撃","translatedEnglishLine":"They charge at the demon army."},{"lineNumber":258082,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍と戦闘、時間が取られた","translatedEnglishLine":"Engaged in battle with the demon army, time was taken."},{"lineNumber":258083,"originalJapaneseLine":"白色破壊光線の直撃喰らって多数が倒れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Many fall from a direct hit of the white destructive beam."},{"lineNumber":258084,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして黒色破壊光線が飛んできた","translatedEnglishLine":"Then a black destructive beam comes flying."},{"lineNumber":258085,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t少し後方に下がる","translatedEnglishLine":"They retreat a little bit backward."},{"lineNumber":258086,"originalJapaneseLine":"白色破壊光線を発射しながら","translatedEnglishLine":"While firing white destructive beams,"},{"lineNumber":258087,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらに魔軍は迫ってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army approaches even more."},{"lineNumber":258088,"originalJapaneseLine":"白色破壊光線で魔軍に近づけない","translatedEnglishLine":"They can't get close due to the white destructive beams."},{"lineNumber":258089,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら、天井に隠れてやりすごす","translatedEnglishLine":"So, they hide on the ceiling to endure."},{"lineNumber":258090,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの名案？","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's brilliant idea?"},{"lineNumber":258091,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍本体が真下に来たので飛び降りる","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the main body of the demon army is right below, they jump down."},{"lineNumber":258092,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイに寄生されたアニスが居た","translatedEnglishLine":"Anis, who was parasitized by the demon Red Eye, was there."},{"lineNumber":258093,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":258094,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダメージを受けて驚くレッドアイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Eye is surprised by the damage taken."},{"lineNumber":258095,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔剣カオスの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the Demon Sword Chaos."},{"lineNumber":258096,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイは強い","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Red Eye is strong."},{"lineNumber":258097,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t勝てそうにないので退却","translatedEnglishLine":"Since they don't look like they'll win, they retreat."},{"lineNumber":258098,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍の補給部隊を発見、撃破","translatedEnglishLine":"They discover and defeat the demon army's supply unit."},{"lineNumber":258099,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレッドアイの寄生ボディとして用意されていた","translatedEnglishLine":"It was prepared as a parasitic body for Red Eye."},{"lineNumber":258100,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリズナを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"They find Rizna."},{"lineNumber":258101,"originalJapaneseLine":"レッドアイがおかしくなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Eye goes berserk."},{"lineNumber":258102,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイを倒したが","translatedEnglishLine":"They defeat the demon Red Eye, but..."},{"lineNumber":258103,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレッドアイ本体は魔物兵に寄生して逃げる","translatedEnglishLine":"The Red Eye's main body escapes by parasitizing a monster soldier."},{"lineNumber":258104,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t解放されたアニスを捕虜にする","translatedEnglishLine":"They take the liberated Anis as a prisoner."},{"lineNumber":258105,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＣＩＴＹ、ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"City, Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":258106,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２０００名のカラー達を連れ帰った","translatedEnglishLine":"They brought back 2000 Kara."},{"lineNumber":258107,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t彼女達はここで住む事になる","translatedEnglishLine":"They will live here from now on."},{"lineNumber":258108,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地下の拷問室で、アニスの処女を頂く","translatedEnglishLine":"In the underground torture chamber, they take Anis's virginity."},{"lineNumber":258109,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアニスはランスに恐怖を覚え次の日に逃走する","translatedEnglishLine":"Anis feels fear towards Rance and escapes the next day."},{"lineNumber":258110,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜ＣＧ：アニスとエロ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<CG: Anis and erotica>"},{"lineNumber":258111,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャラクターイベント（Ａ）","translatedEnglishLine":"Character Event (A)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの森へ到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Forest of Kara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ペンシルカウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Pencil Cow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の侵攻でカラー達はあわてている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Kara and others are panicking due to the demon army's invasion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女王パステルは聖地死守を命じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Queen Pastel commands to defend the sacred ground to the death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの村は結界で隠されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Kara village is hidden by a barrier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にそう簡単には見つからないが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't be easily found by the demon army, however...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急いで行こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's hurry and go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の迎撃をしているイージスと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They encounter Aegis who is intercepting the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イージス、シィルの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Aegis and Shiil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイ登場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Red Eye appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラー娘を惨殺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brutally massacres Kara girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペンシルカウに到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Pencil Cow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルが頑固なので村に火を付けるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Pastel is stubborn, Rance sets fire to the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人みんなで脱出が決まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was decided all villagers will escape together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖地で神具を持ち出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Takes the divine relic from the sacred ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 英霊カラーも同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The heroic spirit Kara also accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２０００名のカラー達を連れて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bringing along 2000 Kara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱出開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Escape begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊急時の脱出用洞窟を使う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They use an emergency escape cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イアンとロナを交尾させようとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to make Ian and Rona mate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイに新しい寄生ボディが用意された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new parasitic body is prepared for the demon Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとリセットの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Rance and Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にカラーの村が見つかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has found the Kara village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟の中まで魔軍が追いかけてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has chased them inside the cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は最後尾に向かうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others head to the rear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線をバリアで防ぐので精一杯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're barely holding back the white destructive beam with a barrier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線の合間をみて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taking advantage of the intervals between white destructive beams,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に向けて突撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They charge at the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と戦闘、時間が取られた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Engaged in battle with the demon army, time was taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線の直撃喰らって多数が倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many fall from a direct hit of the white destructive beam.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして黒色破壊光線が飛んできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then a black destructive beam comes flying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し後方に下がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They retreat a little bit backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線を発射しながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While firing white destructive beams,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに魔軍は迫ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army approaches even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線で魔軍に近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They can't get close due to the white destructive beams.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、天井に隠れてやりすごす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, they hide on the ceiling to endure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの名案？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's brilliant idea?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍本体が真下に来たので飛び降りる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the main body of the demon army is right below, they jump down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイに寄生されたアニスが居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis, who was parasitized by the demon Red Eye, was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダメージを受けて驚くレッドアイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye is surprised by the damage taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Demon Sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイは強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Red Eye is strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てそうにないので退却
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since they don't look like they'll win, they retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の補給部隊を発見、撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They discover and defeat the demon army's supply unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイの寄生ボディとして用意されていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was prepared as a parasitic body for Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They find Rizna.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイがおかしくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye goes berserk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを倒したが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeat the demon Red Eye, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイ本体は魔物兵に寄生して逃げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Eye's main body escapes by parasitizing a monster soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 解放されたアニスを捕虜にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They take the liberated Anis as a prisoner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＩＴＹ、ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City, Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２０００名のカラー達を連れ帰った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They brought back 2000 Kara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女達はここで住む事になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They will live here from now on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下の拷問室で、アニスの処女を頂く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the underground torture chamber, they take Anis's virginity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスはランスに恐怖を覚え次の日に逃走する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis feels fear towards Rance and escapes the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：アニスとエロ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Anis and erotica>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャラクターイベント（Ａ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Character Event (A)

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

soldier."},{"lineNumber":258104,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t解放されたアニスを捕虜にする","translatedEnglishLine":"They take the liberated Anis as a prisoner."},{"lineNumber":258105,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＣＩＴＹ、ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"City, Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":258106,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２０００名のカラー達を連れ帰った","translatedEnglishLine":"They brought back 2000 Kara."},{"lineNumber":258107,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t彼女達はここで住む事になる","translatedEnglishLine":"They will live here from now on."},{"lineNumber":258108,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地下の拷問室で、アニスの処女を頂く","translatedEnglishLine":"In the underground torture chamber, they take Anis's virginity."},{"lineNumber":258109,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアニスはランスに恐怖を覚え次の日に逃走する","translatedEnglishLine":"Anis feels fear towards Rance and escapes the next day."},{"lineNumber":258110,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜ＣＧ：アニスとエロ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<CG: Anis and erotica>"},{"lineNumber":258111,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャラクターイベント（Ａ）","translatedEnglishLine":"Character Event (A)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの森へ到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Forest of Kara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ペンシルカウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Pencil Cow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の侵攻でカラー達はあわてている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Kara and others are panicking due to the demon army's invasion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女王パステルは聖地死守を命じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Queen Pastel commands to defend the sacred ground to the death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの村は結界で隠されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Kara village is hidden by a barrier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にそう簡単には見つからないが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't be easily found by the demon army, however...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急いで行こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's hurry and go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の迎撃をしているイージスと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They encounter Aegis who is intercepting the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イージス、シィルの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Aegis and Shiil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイ登場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Red Eye appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラー娘を惨殺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brutally massacres Kara girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペンシルカウに到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Pencil Cow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステルが頑固なので村に火を付けるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Pastel is stubborn, Rance sets fire to the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人みんなで脱出が決まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was decided all villagers will escape together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖地で神具を持ち出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Takes the divine relic from the sacred ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 英霊カラーも同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The heroic spirit Kara also accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２０００名のカラー達を連れて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bringing along 2000 Kara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脱出開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Escape begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊急時の脱出用洞窟を使う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They use an emergency escape cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イアンとロナを交尾させようとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to make Ian and Rona mate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイに新しい寄生ボディが用意された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new parasitic body is prepared for the demon Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとリセットの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Rance and Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にカラーの村が見つかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has found the Kara village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟の中まで魔軍が追いかけてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has chased them inside the cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は最後尾に向かうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others head to the rear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線をバリアで防ぐので精一杯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're barely holding back the white destructive beam with a barrier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線の合間をみて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taking advantage of the intervals between white destructive beams,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に向けて突撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They charge at the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と戦闘、時間が取られた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Engaged in battle with the demon army, time was taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線の直撃喰らって多数が倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many fall from a direct hit of the white destructive beam.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして黒色破壊光線が飛んできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then a black destructive beam comes flying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し後方に下がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They retreat a little bit backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線を発射しながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While firing white destructive beams,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに魔軍は迫ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army approaches even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白色破壊光線で魔軍に近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They can't get close due to the white destructive beams.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、天井に隠れてやりすごす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, they hide on the ceiling to endure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの名案？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's brilliant idea?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍本体が真下に来たので飛び降りる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the main body of the demon army is right below, they jump down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイに寄生されたアニスが居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis, who was parasitized by the demon Red Eye, was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダメージを受けて驚くレッドアイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye is surprised by the damage taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Demon Sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイは強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Red Eye is strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てそうにないので退却
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since they don't look like they'll win, they retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の補給部隊を発見、撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They discover and defeat the demon army's supply unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイの寄生ボディとして用意されていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was prepared as a parasitic body for Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They find Rizna.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイがおかしくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye goes berserk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを倒したが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeat the demon Red Eye, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイ本体は魔物兵に寄生して逃げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Red Eye's main body escapes by parasitizing a monster soldier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 解放されたアニスを捕虜にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They take the liberated Anis as a prisoner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＩＴＹ、ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City, Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２０００名のカラー達を連れ帰った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They brought back 2000 Kara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女達はここで住む事になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They will live here from now on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下の拷問室で、アニスの処女を頂く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the underground torture chamber, they take Anis's virginity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスはランスに恐怖を覚え次の日に逃走する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anis feels fear towards Rance and escapes the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：アニスとエロ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Anis and erotica>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャラクターイベント（Ａ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Character Event (A)
